description: Wilted spinach salad with bacon, white beans, and a tangy Dijon vinaigrette is a quick, easy, and light summer meal.
keywords: spinach salad, Warm Spinach Salad, WIlted Spinach Salad
name: Wilted Spinach Salad
recipeIngredient: 2 15oz. cans cannellini beans, rinsed and drained ($1.78)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the bacon in a skillet over medium heat until it is brown and crispy. Transfer the cooked bacon to a paper towel-lined plate, leaving the bacon grease in the skillet.
Add the minced garlic to the skillet and saut√© over medium heat for about one minute.
Add the rinsed and drained beans, vinegar, Dijon, sugar, pepper, and salt to the skillet. Continue to cook and stir over medium heat until the beans are heated through and a sauce has formed.
Add the fresh spinach to the skillet, carefully stirring it into the hot beans until it is partially wilted. Remove the skillet from the heat.
Crumble the bacon over top and fold to combine. Taste and add salt or pepper to your liking. Serve warm!
